signInToContinue.note: Header text for the sign-in form

signUp.note: Header text for the sign-up form

signIn.note: Button text for switching to the sign-in form

createAnAccount.note: Button text for switching to the sign-up form

confirmPassword.note: Label for the confirm password field

confirmYourPassword.note: Placeholder for the confirm password field

passwordDescription.text: Use 8 or more characters with a mix of uppercase & lowercase letters, numbers & symbols.
passwordDescription.note: Description text for the password field outlining the requirements

submitSignUp.note: Button text for submitting the sign-up form

submitSignIn.note: Button text for submitting the sign-in form

creatingAccount.note: Notification displayed when a user account is being created

createdAccount.note: Notification displayed when a user account has been successfully created

signingIn.note: Notification displayed when the user is being signed in
